skos:Concept.skos:definition: A recording method that is a string that is assigned to an entity in machine-readable form in order to differentiate the entity from other entities within a local domain, or a notation from a controlled vocabulary that is assigned to an aspect of the entity.
skos:Concept.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A string that is assigned to an entity in order to differentiate the entity from other entities within a local domain, or a notation from a controlled vocabulary that is assigned to an aspect of the entity.
skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: Includes an identifier or notation taken from a vocabulary encoding scheme.

skos:Concept.skos:definition: A recording method that is a string that is assigned to an entity in machine-readable form in order to differentiate the entity from other entities, or to an aspect of an entity, within the global domain of the semantic web and open linked data.
skos:Concept.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A string that is assigned to an entity in order to differentiate the entity from other entities, or to an aspect of an entity, within the global domain of the semantic web and open linked data.

skos:Concept.skos:definition: A recording method that is a string that is a full or partial human-readable description of an entity based on a syntax or string encoding scheme or a controlled term describing an aspect of an entity.
skos:Concept.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A string that is a full or partial description of an entity based on a syntax or string encoding scheme or a controlled term describing an aspect of an entity.
skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: Includes an access point or a controlled term taken from a vocabulary encoding scheme.

skos:Concept.skos:definition: A recording method that is a string that is an uncontrolled human-readable full or partial description of an entity or an uncontrolled term describing an aspect of an entity.
skos:Concept.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A string that is an uncontrolled full or partial description of an entity or an uncontrolled term describing an aspect of an entity.
skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: Includes a note, a transcription, a name or title as it appears in a source of information, and an uncontrolled term.
